markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Quick Shape](/Feats.aspx?ID=2491) <actions string="Free Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Beastkin" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=337" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 80 <sup>3.0</sup>

**Trigger**
You roll initiative.

</column>

---

Your instincts kick in and you take on an aggressive stance. You use Change Shape to enter your hybrid form or a new form granted by a beastkin feat.
name: Quick Shape
